fields.role: Provides scans to reveal enemies and converts info into kills; aggressive entry.
fields.lead_when: When you have scans ready and can force fights.
fields.follow_when: When teammates need intel before committing.
fields.disengage_when: When scans are on cooldown and you lack vision.

ultimate.do_not_use_when: Enemies already low on health and you lack follow‑up.
ultimate.abort_conditions: Ring forces you into tight space before you can activate.

fight_flow.mid_fight: Use tactical to close gaps, maintain vision.
fight_flow.exit_reset: Ult to reset or finish low‑health foes.

rotations.late_game: Use ult for final ring control.
rotations.bad_rotation: Rotating without scans, getting caught blind.

ideal_secondary.reason: Close‑range finishers when you close in.

common_mistakes: Using scans too early and wasting them
fields.mental_rule: If you lack info → scan first.
